title: Top 10 Richest Guitarists 2017 [News]
text: + Submit article Top 10 Richest Guitarists 2017 Richest guitar players from the UK, that is. The fella on top has been No. 1 for 25 years now. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 10 hours ago 0 An interesting rundown has surfaced via Total Guitar , showcasing 10 richest guitarists from the UK right now. The list features a variety of all-time giants, while the individual on No. 1 has been on top of this list for 25 years now. You can check out the whole thing below, consult the source for additional commentary. 10. Ronnie Wood - £55 million ($67 million) 9. Pete Townshend - £75 million ($91.5 million) 8. Mark Knopfler - £75 million ($91.5 million) 7. David Gilmour - £100 million ($122 million) 6. Jimmy Page - £105 million ($128 million) 5. Brian May - £120 million ($146.5 million) 4. Eric Clapton - £160 million ($195.5 million) 3. Keith Richards - £220 million ($268.5 million) 2. The Edge - £500 million ($610.5 million) (U2's total worth) 1. Paul McCartney - £760 million ($928 million)
